rules.title: Promulgation of Ordinances
rules.content: Promulgation of ordinances under Article 89 of the Constitution when Parliament is not in session, requiring the President’s approval on the Prime Minister’s advice.

rules.title: Appointments of Judges
rules.content: Appointment of Supreme Court and High Court judges under Articles 177 and 193 of the Constitution, requiring the President’s orders.

rules.title: Dissolution of National Assembly
rules.content: Dissolution of the National Assembly on the Prime Minister’s advice under Article 58 of the Constitution, requiring the President’s approval.

rules.title: Emergency Declarations
rules.content: Proclamation of emergencies under Article 232 of the Constitution, requiring the President’s orders.

title: CASES REQUIRING CONSULTATION WITH ESTABLISHMENT DIVISION

rules.title: Senior Appointments
rules.content: Appointments to Grade 20 and above posts in the federal government, requiring consultation with the Establishment Division.

rules.title: Civil Service Rules
rules.content: Framing or amending rules for civil service recruitment, promotion, or conditions of service, requiring consultation with the Establishment Division.

rules.title: Deputation of Officers
rules.content: Deputation of federal officers to provincial governments or international organizations, requiring consultation with the Establishment Division.

rules.title: Disciplinary Actions
rules.content: Major disciplinary actions against Grade 17 and above officers, requiring consultation with the Establishment Division.

title: CASES REQUIRING CONSULTATION WITH FINANCE DIVISION

rules.title: Budget Allocations
rules.content: Proposals for new expenditure or reallocation of budget funds, requiring consultation with the Finance Division.

rules.title: Tax Proposals
rules.content: Introduction, alteration, or abolition of taxes, requiring consultation with the Finance Division.

rules.title: Public Loans
rules.content: Floating of federal loans or issuance of government guarantees, requiring consultation with the Finance Division.

rules.title: Foreign Grants
rules.content: Acceptance of foreign grants or loans with financial implications, requiring consultation with the Finance Division.
